name: Meditopia-GuidedMeditation,BedtimeStories
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my meditopia
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A meditation app that touches your soul…
Meditopia is the leading app that helps you to get calm, reduce stress, sleep well, love, find peace and start a deep discovery within yourself. You can create a space for yourself in life and discover the happiness within.

You can listen to meditation sessions with top quality audio. You can learn to meditate, listen music and bedtime stories to relax and sleep well.

HOW DOES IT WORK?
Get started by saying; 
- "Alexa, open My Meditopia"
- "Alexa, ask My Meditopia to play sleep story"
- "Alexa, open My Meditopia for sleep meditation"
- "Alexa, ask My Meditopia for meditation"
- "Alexa, ask My Meditopia for relaxation meditation"
- "Alexa, tell My Meditopia for morning meditation"
- "Alexa, tell my Meditopia to play music"


Our aim is to spread meditation all around the world and make meditation more accessible!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
